Articles.Content:
So I've looked around a lot of places on the forums, and others, and cannot find anything with reference to the line entry "hps" in the default resource defs file in the Squad data. I used to hack around with resource defs quite a bit, but havn't done so since about pre-0.23, so that pretty much explains my stance here. So basically, I was just wondering, what is this mysterious value "hps", and is it even required in a resource definition?

Cheers,
[This post](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125138-Hacking-your-libraries-Creating-rescources) as all the info you need
Ah awesome, I didn't even see that one xD Thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[@sarbian](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/57146-sarbian/) Y a t il une autre page ou on peut trouver <abbr title="Launch Escape System">les</abbr> memes infos ? (celle que vous nous donnez n'existe plus)

Merci pour vos réponses ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

[Added translation]  

@sarbian Is there another page where you can find the same info? (the one you give us no longer exists) thank you for your answers
